subject: Steroids
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. players union entered into a one-year agreement with Abbott Nutrition to supply $5,000 of its EAS brand supplements to each team and to give players a 50 percent discount on its products.
snippet: The N.B.A. players union entered into a one-year agreement with Abbott Nutrition to supply $5,000 of its EAS brand supplements to each team and to give players a 50 percent discount on its products.
